name: Summer Time
overview:
Summertime is a 2-player rectangular coin pusher, derived from the successful 8-player, manufactured under the KISS trademark keeping it simple in design and construction, and therefore offering superb value for money.

The 2-player Summertime will fit into even the smallest spaces, and earns the highest of revenues with small playfields suitable for coins of all sizes, from the smallest to the very largest.

Summertime's sound system plays some of the worlds favourite summertime tunes and the colourful cabinet displays player-attracting graphics featuring cartoon-style beach and surfing scenes.

The 2 player Summertime also incorporates an optional skill-arm, allowing the player to direct his coin into play and is available in coin or ticket payout making it ideal for cash or ticket redemption locations.
